title: Cant apply for PBE. Site does not wrok
body: icant apply for a pbe account. the site does not work and has not so for a couple of months. any explanation why it doesnt work?

replies.body:
In order to access the PBE page, you'll want to log into your account from the [EUW landing page.](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com)

Once you've logged in, you should be able to access the PBE Login page from [this link.](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

Let me know if this worked for you.
